item.title: Demo
Devlog
item.description: 2022-03-03 I took another step towards a clear plan for structure representation. While design information should generally exist in unstructured chunk meshes, some organization is reasonable at the architecture level. It is often useful to have clear divisions between structures that pertain to different concepts. Just like individuals use distinct notebooks or binders for distinct projects, we should be free to create distinct conceptual structures. As currently envisioned, chunks in different structures cannot depend on, include, query, or affect one another.

item.title: Documentation
